page.t: WarehouseFleet ships will only buy from NPC stations if the player account will remain above this threshold
Enable/Disable auto-transfer of credits from Warehouse accounts to Player account
If 'Transfer to Player' is enabled, auto-transfers will occur when Warehouse account exceeds this amount. Auto-transfers all but the minimum amount.
Enable/Disable auto-transfer of credits from Player account to Warehouse accounts
If 'Transfer to Station' is enabled, auto-transfers will occur when Warehouse account drops below this amount. Auto-transfers up to the minimum amount.
Trade orders may fail and leave cargo unhandled in the ships. Select the method of cargo auto-handling below\n\n
Refund: Wares are refunded back to the Player based on their average prices. Shows up as a Transfer on the transaction log\n\n
Teleport: Wares are teleported to the Warehouse\n\n
Return: Wares are returned to the Warehouse through trade orders\n\n
